papers.title: A Unified Foundation for Multi-Chain Applications
papers.abstract: Our inaugural white paper introducing Apex SDK's foundational approach to multi-chain application development. This comprehensive paper presents our vision for a unified development framework that bridges the gap between different blockchain ecosystems, enabling developers to build robust, secure, and interoperable applications across multiple chains.
papers.citation: Apex SDK Team. (2026). A Unified Foundation for Multi-Chain Applications. Apex SDK White Paper.
